TextLibrary.Text: Sunspear
Now we must seek one of the Eyes of Sartek.
Now we must seek one of the Eyes of Sartek.
Now we must seek one of the Eyes of Sartek.
Now we must seek one of the Eyes of Sartek.
Do you know where it is?
Do you know where it is?
Do you know where it is?
Do you know where it is?
The Lesser Races have the Eye. The Elves of Silvermyr took it from our homeland many years ago.
The Lesser Races have the Eye. The Elves of Silvermyr took it from our homeland many years ago.
The Lesser Races have the Eye. The Elves of Silvermyr took it from our homeland many years ago.
The Lesser Races have the Eye. The Elves of Silvermyr took it from our homeland many years ago.
I know Queen Titania of Silvermyr very well. If we ask, she might give it back.
I know Queen Titania of Silvermyr very well. If we ask, she might give it back.
I know Queen Titania of Silvermyr very well. If we ask, she might give it back.
I know Queen Titania of Silvermyr very well. If we ask, she might give it back.
Hrmph. I doubt it. The Elves keep it at the top of a tree known as the Tree of Seeing. They use it to see any danger approaching their forest. They will not be persuaded to part with it easily.
Hrmph. I doubt it. The Elves keep it at the top of a tree known as the Tree of Seeing. They use it to see any danger approaching their forest. They will not be persuaded to part with it easily.
Hrmph. I doubt it. The Elves keep it at the top of a tree known as the Tree of Seeing. They use it to see any danger approaching their forest. They will not be persuaded to part with it easily.
Hrmph. I doubt it. The Elves keep it at the top of a tree known as the Tree of Seeing. They use it to see any danger approaching their forest. They will not be persuaded to part with it easily.
Nevertheless, we should travel to Silvermyr and ask the Queen first.
Nevertheless, we should travel to Silvermyr and ask the Queen first.

Nevertheless, we should travel to Silvermyr and ask the Queen first.
